arts.ttl: St.Pauli let Leipzig off lightly in scoreless stalemate
arts.sum: Another weekend of Bundesliga action was brought to an end by the meeting of St.Pauli and RB Leipzig at the Millerntor Stadion. Marco Rose's side were pushed to the brink by the hosts who earned a spirit-boosting 0-0 draw.

arts.ttl: St. Pauli vs. RB Leipzig preview: Hosts looking to get off the mark
arts.sum: St. Pauli will be targeting their first points of the season when they welcome RB Leipzig to Millerntor-Stadion.

arts.ttl: Preview: St Pauli vs. RB Leipzig - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between St Pauli and RB Leipzig, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Man United 'failed' with Xavi Simons approach but handed Â£68m transfer hope
arts.sum: Manchester United reportedly failed with an approach to sign Paris Saint-Germain's Xavi Simons over the summer before his loan return to RB Leipzig.

arts.ttl: Leipzig confirm loss of Kampl through next international break
arts.sum: RB Leipzig confirmed on Friday evening that Slovenian midfielder Kevin Kampl will be sidelined through the October international break with an adductor injury.
